snippet: The new policy that gives young illegal immigrants a reprieve from deportation and a chance to work is an application of common sense.
abstract: Editorial praises the courage of illegal immigrants who came out in droves to take advantage of a new policy granting them a reprieve from deportation and a chance to work; contends that the policy is a wise investment in America's future prosperity.
lead_paragraph: The new policy that gives young illegal immigrants a reprieve from deportation and a chance to work is an application of common sense.

headline.seo: Long Lines and Big Dreams for Illegal Immigrants

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
